summary: In China in 1935, seven dedicated missionary women try to protect themselves from the advances of a barbaric Mongolian warlord and his cut-throat gang of warriors.
cast: Anne Bancroft|Sue Lyon|Margaret Leighton|Flora Robson|Mildred Dunnock|Betty Field|Anna Lee|Eddie Albert|Mike Mazurki|Woody Strode|Jane Chang|Hans William Lee|H.W. Gim|Irene Tsu|Lee Kolima
title: Siete mujeres
